title: Kylie Minogue wishes sister Dannii happy 48th birthday in cute tribute
text:
Kylie Minogue wished her sister Dannii a happy 48th birthday (Photo by Christie Goodwin/Getty Images)

Kylie Minogue has publicly wished her little sister Dannii a happy 48th birthday with a beautiful tribute.

The All the Lovers singer sent a loving message to her sis on Instagram along with a series of photos of the two of them from childhood to today.

‘Happy, HAPPY birthday to my lil sis @danniiminogue,’ the Aussie superstar wrote.

‘My mind floods with so many memories – from making fun and games out of nothing when we were little, our connecting wardrobes when we were teens (imagine!!!) all the hours you put in to work at such a young age and you, me and our brother Brendan all being so fortunate to have our family and each other. I could go on and on!!!’

She finally added: ‘In short, I love you and I’m so proud of you Mama!!! Happy birthday!’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Adorable!

In other Dannii news, the Put the Needle On It singer recently opened up about her time on The X Factor – and her infamous feud with fellow judge Sharon Osbourne.

‘I was not at breaking point, I was broken,’ the star told Australian publication The Herald Sun.

Kylie said she is ‘so proud’ of her sis (Picture: David M. Benett/Getty Images)

‘There were a lot of people conspiring to make that happen and it brought a lot of people enjoyment to see me so under the pump.’

Dannii – a mum to 8-year-old Ethan – added: ‘I get that it is a TV show, it is entertainment, there is quite a game involved with the business but you have to be fair and it just got to the point where I was so unhappy.’

Dannii on The X Factor in 2010 (Picture: Rex Features)

Dannii was a judge on the show from 2007 until 2010. One of her acts, Leon Jackson, won the show in 2007, while another, Matt Cardle, won in 2010.

As a singer, Dannii is known for the top 10 hits I Begin To Wonder and Don’t Wanna Lose This Feeling.

description: Kylie Minogue wishes sister Dannii Minogue happy 48th birthday in sweet tribute
